summary: A chronicle of the life of a middle-class French girl's sexual adventures, her then fall into prostitution, and her ultimate redemption.
cast: Belén Fabra|Leonardo Sbaraglia|Llum Barrera|Geraldine Chaplin|Ángela Molina|Pedro Gutiérrez|José Chaves|Jorge-Yamam Serrano|Antonio Garrido|Jaume García Arija|David Vert|Javier Coromina|Judith Diakhate|Natasha Yarovenko|Laura De Pedro|Mariona Tena|Yanik Parra|Carlota Frisón|Mariana Expósito Castaño|Alba Ribas|Bastian Ckateau|Santi Monreal|Nilo Zimmerman|Juan Carlos Claros|Ester Aira|Laura Gil|Miko Jarry|Ferran Lahoz|Óscar García|Carlos Olalla|Chesu Puente|Jemi Paretas|Félix Mata
title: Diario de una ninfómana
